data_table.description: The dataset provides BMI, height, weight data, and age at observation.

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52 External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2181644 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: weight
variable.comment: Non-pregnant weights (do not include weights during pregnancy or 9 months after pregnancy) External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2179689 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: height
variable.comment: One observation age corresponds to one height. If more than one height value is available for the same observation age, use the median value. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2179643 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: body_mass_index
variable.comment: 1.Non-pregnant BMI (do not include BMIs during pregnancy or 9 months after pregnancy); 2.Imputed BMI based - 6 month time period External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID:2006410 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: age_observation
variable.description: Age when clinical event recorded in record
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2003852 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: visit_number
variable.description: A database generated unique key created for weight, height, BMI repeated values
